summary: A Work In Progress To Recreate The Lords Mail
descriptionHtml:
This is my WIP to recreate the lords mail from morrowind, arena and daggerfall, this will take time and atm is a heavy WIP. and yes i know it looks pretty crappy right now but as i said Heavy Wip, the final version will hopefully be looking fairly professional, but i thought i would release this to the world now so they can see some of my progress :)

In the final version it will still be a replacer for general tullius\'s armor as i wish it to be an artifact and therefore unique so it will give people more of an incentive to Crush the Legion! as that will be the only way to legitimately obtain it, of course u culd just use console commands :P

I shall also work on bringing back some other artifacts such as chrysamere and some others, and one of these shall be for ulfric to have, again so theres more incentive to Crush the Rebellion!

To Do;
Redo Meshes to make plates stand out more and remove chainmail hood
carry on updating textures, make them much higher quality
add enchantments similar to original enchantments
rename the item

Version Log;
V0.01 Alpha - total overhaul of tullius armor, atm fairly low quality textures and normal map, removed skirt and shoulder pleats, added shoulder pauldron and chainmail hood, extended shoulder plates to cover shoulders, added chainmail to replace red fabric, added basic neckguard, removed decals from main body and added plates on the legs

Installation;
NMM:
I Reccomend Using Nexus Mon Manager, just activate and accept any overwrites
Manual:
Just unpack and move the Textures folder into your data folder and say yes to any overwrites
Uninstallation;
Just delete the files added by this mod

This is only my third mod to be released so feedback is much appreciated and if you enjoy this, Endorse It!

My Other Mods;
Retextures For Jaysus Swords; http://skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=4871
author: Hrusai
